translation.en: Would you like to see before, you know...
translation.zh: 你想在之前看上一眼吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Brian? Who's this?
translation.zh: 布莱恩？这是谁？

translation.en: You know, I asked myself the same thing when my dad passed.
translation.zh:
我父亲去世的时候
我也问自己同样的问题

translation.en: I said, "Who is this man?"
translation.zh: 我说，"这个男的是谁？"

translation.en: No, no, Brian. Who's this in the coffin?
translation.zh: 不，布莱恩，在棺材里的这个人是谁？

translation.en: -Because that's not my father. -Are you sure?
translation.zh:
-因为那不是我爸爸
-你确定？

translation.en: Are you asking me if I'm sure I know what my father looks like?
translation.zh:
你是在问我是否确定
我爸爸长什么样子？

translation.en: No, people make mistakes in a time of grief, Aaron.
translation.zh: 不，人们在悲痛期间往往会犯错误，艾伦

translation.en: Look at the damn body, man.
translation.zh: 看看这该死的尸体

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 噢，该死

translation.en: -You got Jackie Chan in there! -Okay, listen...
translation.zh:
-那是个中国人！
-好吧，听着...

translation.en: Come on, Brian. You know what my father looks like.
translation.zh:
拜托，布莱恩
你知道我爸爸长什么样

translation.en: We are very scattered today.
translation.zh: 我们今天非常疏忽

translation.en: This type of thing almost never happens.
translation.zh: 这样的事情几乎从没发生过

translation.en: -Almost never happens? -I said that out loud?
translation.zh:
-几乎从没发生过？
-我说得很响吗？

translation.en: It's not Burger King. You can't just mess up my order.
translation.zh:
这不是在汉堡王...
你们不能就这样把人弄混

translation.en: Please, just calm down. I think I know where he is.
translation.zh:
请冷静
我想我知道他在哪儿

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: If my dad's not in this coffin in one hour, then you have to take his place.
translation.zh:
如果我爸爸一小时内没在这个棺材里
那你就代替他的位置

translation.en: -You got it? -Don't worry. I'll get him back.
translation.zh:
-你听明白了？
-别担心，我会带他回来

translation.en: I promise that. He's in one of two places. I think it's the second place.
translation.zh:
我保证，他有可能在两个地方
我想他在第二个地方

translation.en: Listen, okay, guys? Let's pack this up. Close this.
translation.zh:
听着，伙计们？我们收拾一下
把这个关上

translation.en: Let's go, let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们走，我们离开这儿

translation.en: Wait a minute, before we move... Okay. Did I give you my keys?
translation.zh:
等等，在我们离开之前...
我把钥匙给你了吗？

translation.en: No. They in the car. I left the damn keys in the car.
translation.zh:
没有，它们在车里
我把该死的钥匙落在车里了

translation.en: Let's go, guys. I think it's on.
translation.zh: 我们走，伙计们，我想它还在发动着

translation.en: If you're so antsy about being here, why'd you come out in the first place?
translation.zh:
如果你在这儿感觉很紧张的话
为什么你不早点出来？

translation.en: -You know why. -I hate funerals.
translation.zh:
-你知道为什么
-我讨厌葬礼

translation.en: All about death, death, death.
translation.zh: 都是关于死、死、死的

translation.en: I don't think funerals are designed for anybody to like, Norman.
translation.zh: 我想葬礼并不是让人喜欢的，诺曼

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.zh: 我想是吧

translation.en: I don't want a regular funeral when it's my time to go, you know.
translation.zh: 我死了以后，我不想要一个普通的葬礼

translation.en: I want my life celebrated.
translation.zh: 我想庆祝我的一生

translation.en: Like Anna Nicole Smith, Richard Nixon, somebody big and powerful.
translation.zh:
像安尼克史密斯、理查德尼克松
那些伟大而有权力的人那样

translation.en: I want mine to be the saddest day ever.

translation.en: Stock market should crash, factories shut down,
translation.zh:
股市应该崩盘
工厂关门

translation.en: girls crying in the streets.
translation.zh: 姑娘们在街上痛哭

translation.en: That kind of thing. An eclipse would be nice.

等类似这样的事
再有一次日食就更好了

translation.en: -Come on. -What?
translation.zh:
-拜托
-怎么了？

translation.en: You still smoking after all of those warnings and stuff out there?
translation.zh:
这么多警告还有外面那些东西
你还吸烟？

translation.en: No, Norman, stop, all right. You used to smoke.
translation.zh:
不，诺曼，停下，好吧
你以前吸烟

translation.en: We used to smoke together.
translation.zh: 我们以前一起吸烟的

translation.en: I used to piss my pants and then I stopped.
translation.zh: 我以前还尿裤子，后来不了

translation.en: I got my own problems to worry about without worrying about your damn smoking.
translation.zh:
我自己的事都烦不过来
别让我操心你吸那该死的烟

translation.en: Come on, Norman. What problems you got, man?
translation.zh:
拜托，诺曼
你怎么了，伙计？

translation.en: -I told you! My rash! -Got to use condoms, papa.
translation.zh:
-我告诉过你！我的疹子！
-要用避孕套的，爸爸

translation.en: -On my hand, dude. -You still have to use a condom, Norman.
translation.zh:
-是我手上长的，伙计
-你仍然需要用避孕套的，诺曼

translation.en: That's the first line of defense.
translation.zh: 那是一级防备

translation.en: This shit ain't normal. Look at it.
translation.zh: 这不正常，看它

translation.en: -Fuck. That ain't a rash, man. -What you think it is?
translation.zh:
-妈的，那不是疹子
-你觉得那是什么？

translation.en: I don't know, but it's very splotchy.
translation.zh: 我不知道，但看起来脏兮兮的

translation.en: Splotchy? I hate splotchy. I'm gonna pass away, I'm gonna die!
translation.zh:
脏兮兮的？我讨厌脏
我要死了，我要死了！

translation.en: -Nah. -And I'm so damn young!
translation.zh:
-啊
-我还这么年轻！

translation.en: They brought the wrong body.
translation.zh: 他们拿错了遗体

translation.en: Honey, did you hear me? They brought the wrong body.
translation.zh:
亲爱的，你听见我的话了吗？
他们拿错了遗体

translation.en: Oh, my God! Well, do they know where he is?
translation.zh:
哦，上帝！
他们知道他在哪儿吗？

translation.en: They think so.
translation.zh: 他们知道

translation.en: I told you. I told you not to use the Marshalls,
translation.zh:
我告诉过你
我告诉过你别找马沙公司

translation.en: but, no, you wanted to keep it all in the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 但是，你只想就近搞定

translation.en: Don't rub it in, not today. I got too much to worry about.

别唠唠叨叨，今天不行
我有太多的事要忙

translation.en: Dad insisted on having his funeral at home, so now I just can't escape it.

爸爸坚持在家里举行他的葬礼
所以我逃不了

translation.en: Death is everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都是死亡的气息

translation.en: Baby, no. No, it's not.
translation.zh: 宝贝，不，不是的

translation.en: Mom won't stop crying.

translation.en: -Ryan hasn't helped out. -Not like he ever does.
translation.zh:
-瑞安毫不帮忙
-他从来没帮过什么

translation.en: Plus on top of that, I got to worry about this whole eulogy thing.
translation.zh: 除此以外，我最担心悼词的事

translation.en: I am sure it'll be the best eulogy anybody's ever heard.

translation.en: Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: All anybody's gonna be thinking is, "Why isn't Ryan doing the eulogy?
translation.zh:
所有的人都会想
"为什么瑞安不来做悼词？"

translation.en: "Step aside and let the writer say a few words."
translation.zh: "站到一边去，让作家说几句"

translation.en: Even I'm gonna be thinking it.
translation.zh: 甚至我会这么想

translation.en: Why don't you just let him do it then?
translation.zh: 为什么你不让他来做？

translation.en: So, now you want Ryan to do the eulogy?

translation.en: No. I'm just saying...
translation.zh: 不，我是想说...

translation.en: You're just saying that you wanna hear Ryan's eulogy.
translation.zh: 你刚刚说你想听瑞安的悼词

translation.en: No. You're the oldest, so...
translation.zh: 不，你是长子，所以...

translation.en: So, the only reason I should do it is because I'm old.

那我做悼词的唯一原因
就因为我是老大

translation.en: Aaron, calm down.
translation.zh: 艾伦，冷静

translation.en: I think that you are every bit as good a writer as your brother.

我认为你跟你弟弟一样
是个很好的作家

translation.en: I just think that you need to let someone actually read your book.

我想你需要
让别人读读你的书

translation.en: It's not ready yet.
translation.zh: 还没准备好

translation.en: Okay, fine. But don't forget, we close on the house next week.

好吧，别忘了
我们下个礼拜就搬出去

translation.en: -I know. -I mean, I love your mom,
translation.zh:
-我知道
-我爱你妈妈

translation.en: but I am so ready to move.
translation.zh: 但我非常想搬家

translation.en: I know, honey, but we just got to get through today, okay?

我知道，亲爱的
但我们得先过了今天，好吗？

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I know this is rough.
translation.zh: 我知道这很难熬

translation.en: But it's the last day of my cycle.

translation.en: And I'm 37 years old, so we need to try to,

translation.en: you know, we need to do it, at least once today, okay?

我们需要做一次
至少今天一次，好吗？

translation.en: -Babe. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-宝贝
-什么？

translation.en: You're gonna have to switch that cycle down to low for now, just for now.

你需要把期限调整一下

translation.en: Can we at least find the body first?

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, absolutely.

-你还好吗？
-是的，很好

translation.en: Okay, I'm a... I'm a little nervous.

好的，我有点...
我有点紧张

translation.en: Why, because you're gonna see my dad again?

translation.en: I just don't think I've ever been so openly hated by anyone before.

translation.en: Even my seventh graders aren't that mean.

translation.en: I think he's gonna be more concerned today that his brother just died than be...

我想他的注意力会集中在
他哥哥的葬礼上...

translation.en: -Babe. -I'm sorry, baby. It's the traffic.
translation.zh:
-宝贝
-抱歉，塞车了

translation.en: Right. Anyway, when I tell him that we're getting married,
translation.zh:
好的，不管怎样
我今天告诉他我们要结婚的时候

translation.en: he's just gonna have to accept you. I...

translation.en: -Jesus! Are you okay? -Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
-上帝，你还好吗？
-噢，我的上帝

translation.en: -You asshole! -Fuck you, bitch.
translation.zh:
-你个混蛋
-操，泼妇

translation.en: Oh, yeah, flip me off. Can't you see there's a traffic jam?

哦，好，向我竖中指
你没看到塞车吗？

translation.en: You poke your eye out, your father's gonna kill me.

小心别捅了眼睛
否则爸爸会杀了我

translation.en: -Oscar, baby. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-奥斯卡，宝贝
-是的

translation.en: -Look at me. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-看着我
-好的

translation.en: -Relax. Okay? -All right.
translation.zh:
-放松，好吗？
-好的

translation.en: Everything is fine. Okay? Breathe.

一切都会好的，好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Better? -Better.
translation.zh:
-感觉好点了？

translation.en: Oh, good. It's okay.

translation.en: Fuck you!

translation.en: I think you'll find that everything is in perfect order.

translation.en: Oh, so, now you wanna be professional.

translation.en: You got your keys? You got your BlackBerry?

你把钥匙拿出来了吗？
手机拿出来了吗？

因为一旦我们埋葬了他

translation.en: just so you can tweet.

translation.en: Hey, how is your mother holding up, Aaron?

translation.en: She's fine. She's in great health.

translation.en: -There's no more business here. -Good.
translation.zh:
-这里没生意了
-好的

translation.en: What about your Uncle Russell? He wasn't doing that well.

那你的罗塞尔叔叔呢？
他没那么健康

translation.en: -How's he doing? -Bye.

-他状况如何？
-再见

好的，我只是问问
谈话而已

translation.en: I'm here if you need me, you know that. Thank you for everything.

如果你有需要，我会在这儿

-米歇尔，过来

translation.en: You don't have to come.

我只是说，大家都知道

translation.en: for fried chicken from a slave named Jubalai.

translation.en: Now, I give him credit for the coleslaw, but that's it.

我只称赞他的卷心菜色拉
仅此而已

translation.en: Hey, buddy! How you doing?

translation.en: I need a favor. I need you to pick up Uncle Russell.

我需要帮忙
我需要你接一下罗塞尔叔叔

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's a hassle, but you're the closest.

是的，我知道这是件麻烦事
但你离得最近

-该死！他总是脾气很坏

如果他总是这样，那就不是情绪的事
这是他的性格，你能去吗？

translation.en: All right, I'll do it.
translation.zh: 好吧，我去

translation.en: Travel. We were going to Australia and China.

旅游
我们准备去澳大利亚和中国

拜托，妈
你是不会坐25个小时飞机的

这不是关键
我一直感觉不好

谁知道没有他
我会活多久？

translation.en: It might make a difference if I had a grandchild

如果我有个孙子
可能就不一样了

translation.en: who could take my mind off of everything, but...

translation.en: -Oh, well. -Cynthia, we are trying.
translation.zh:
-哦，好吧
-塞蒂娅，我们在努力

我知道你们打算要孩子，米歇尔
白天晚上不停地试

translation.en: But it doesn't seem to be working, now does it?
translation.zh: 但是好像没有效果，不是吗？

translation.en: Where's Ryan? -Have you talked to him yet? -He should be here soon.

-瑞安在哪儿？你跟他联系过吗？
-他很快就会到了

translation.en: Just to see his face would make me feel so much better.

看到他的脸
会让我感觉好点

translation.en: Oh, I have missed him so much. My baby.
translation.zh: 我太想念他了，我的宝贝

translation.en: Do you need me to do something, Cynthia?

translation.en: You could take your hand off my husband's coffin.

你可以把你的手
从我丈夫的棺材上拿下来

translation.zh: 你留下印子了

translation.en: Is she shooting us the finger? Or is she just waving?

她是在竖手指
还是在挥手？

translation.en: That's nice, ladies! Thank you!
translation.zh: 那很好，女士们！谢谢！

translation.en: -There he is. -What?
translation.zh:
-他在那儿
-什么？

translation.en: -He's okay. -He's gonna need assistance?
translation.zh:
-他很好
-他需要帮助吗？

translation.en: He's just grumpy.
translation.zh: 他只是脾气坏

translation.en: You got to know how to handle him.
translation.zh: 你要知道如何对付他

translation.en: Oh, he looks kind of sweet.
translation.zh: 他看起来和蔼

translation.en: -Hi, Uncle Russell! -Hi, Uncle Russell!

-嗨，罗塞尔叔叔！
-嗨，罗塞尔叔叔！

translation.en: You remember me? I'm Norman.
translation.zh: 你记得我吗？我是诺曼

translation.en: I came to pick you up and take you to the funeral.

translation.en: Where the fuck you been, you fat bastard? You took any longer, I'd be dead, too!

你死到哪儿去了，你这个胖混球？
你再晚点，我也要死了

translation.en: Shit, good thing you know how to handle him.
translation.zh: 狗屎，还好你知道如何对付他

translation.en: Would you like to ride shotgun?

translation.en: Stop the game, all right?

translation.en: ...take this missile in your ass.
translation.zh: ...屁股中弹

translation.en: -Listen. -Yes, the pills. I have them.
translation.zh:
-听着
-是的，药，我有

translation.en: -They're right here. -All right, cool. Can I come and get them?
translation.zh:
-它们在这儿

-我得参见一个葬礼，妈的！

translation.en: -Fuck. -Did you try them?
translation.zh:
-操
-你试过吗？

translation.en: No, no, I'm not gonna try them. I made them.
translation.zh: 没，我不准备试，我研制的

translation.en: But they're good, right? The stuff's good?

但是它们不错，是吗？
东西好吗？

translation.en: I got to go. Never get high on your own supply.

我要挂了

伙计，这玩意能让你很爽的
我保证

translation.en: You'll love it. All right, got to go. Bye.
translation.zh: 你会爱上它的，好了，挂了，再见

这是我的家，所以...
你还好吗，伙计？

translation.en: -He's fine. He's just freaking out. -Is he okay?
translation.zh:
-他很好，他只是吓坏了
-他还好吗？

translation.en: -A car almost ran into us, and I was yelling. -And this guy just jumped right in our lane.

-一辆车差点撞到我们，我叫了起来
-这个家伙突然出现在我们前面

translation.en: -I didn't see him. -He did, he totally did.
translation.zh:
-我没看到他
-他看到了，他绝对看到了

translation.en: -I'm sorry, baby, I... -No, baby, it's fine. It's fine, okay?
translation.zh:
-对不起，宝贝，我...
-不，宝贝，没事了，好吗？

translation.en: You guys are funny. Hey, what do you think?
translation.zh:
你们很搞笑
嘿，你觉得怎样？

translation.en: -Yes, no? -No.
translation.zh:
-是的，不？
-不

translation.en: -Go put on your pants, please. -All right.
translation.zh:
-穿上裤子，拜托
-好吧

translation.en: And make sure they're black, Jeffrey!
translation.zh: 穿条黑色的，杰夫瑞

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
translation.zh: 好的，妈妈

translation.en: -I'm so hungry. -God, my heart is racing.
translation.zh:
-我好饿
-上帝，我的心跳加速

translation.en: I don't know what's wrong with me.
translation.zh: 我不知道我出了什么问题

translation.en: Oh, here. Take this one. It'll calm you down. Jeff won't mind.
translation.zh:
哦，这里，拿着这个
它会让你镇静，杰夫不会介意的

translation.en: What do you mean, take one of those? What is that?
translation.zh:
什么意思，吃一片吗？
这是什么？

translation.en: It's Valium. I used to take it all the time. It's gonna make you feel better, I promise.
translation.zh:
是安定，我经常吃的
它会使你感觉好些，我保证

translation.en: -Valium, are you sure? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-安定，你确定？
-是的

translation.en: -Yes. -You know, I shouldn't be taking
translation.zh:
-是的
-你知道，我不应该吃

translation.en: someone else's pills, right?
translation.zh: 别人的药，是吗？

translation.en: -No, it's okay. -I got to drive and...
translation.zh:
-不，没关系
-我得开车...

translation.en: Babe, I'll drive. All right? Just open wide. There we go. Take...
translation.zh:
宝贝，我来开，好吗？
张大嘴，给你，咽...

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -Oh, my keys. -Jeff, you're wearing sneakers?
translation.zh:
-哦，我的钥匙
-杰夫，你穿的是运动鞋吗？

translation.en: -They're black, Elaine. -But they're sneakers, Jeff.
translation.zh:
-是黑色的，艾琳
-但是是运动鞋，杰夫

translation.en: Is he gonna be any less dead if I'm not wearing sneakers?
translation.zh:
如果我不穿运动鞋
他就不会死吗？

translation.en: -Forget it. Let's just go. Can I just... -No, I got it.
translation.zh:
-算了，我们走，我能...
-不，我可以

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Come on, Jeff. -I'm coming. I'm coming.
translation.zh:
-快点，杰夫
-我来了，来了

translation.en: -We're waiting. -Oh, shoot!
translation.zh:
-我们在等
-哦，天！

translation.en: I still can't believe he's gone.
translation.zh: 我仍然不敢相信他走了

translation.en: You can't understand death until you've given life.
translation.zh: 你没生过孩子就不会明白死亡

translation.en: -Hey, Mama. -Ryan, my baby!
translation.zh:
-嘿，妈妈
-瑞安，我的宝贝！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Mama, I know this is hard, but it's gonna be okay,
translation.zh:
妈妈，我知道这很难
但是一切都会好的

translation.en: and we're gonna get through it.
translation.zh: 我们会熬过去的

translation.en: Oh, Ryan, you always know exactly what to say, always!
translation.zh: 瑞安，你总是很会说话！

translation.en: I guess if people died every week, we'd see you all the time.
translation.zh:
我猜如果每周有人死
我们就总能看见你

translation.en: -Hey, big bro. How you doing? -Holding up.
translation.zh:
-嘿，哥，你怎样？
-还坚持得住

translation.en: -How was your flight, Ryan? -It was okay.
translation.zh:
-旅途如何，瑞安？
-还可以

translation.en: But I had to buy the seat next to me. I just can't do the small talk anymore.
translation.zh:
但是我不得不把我旁边的座位也买下来
我只是没法跟人聊天

translation.en: And while I'm sitting there, up in first class, they march all the broke people through.
translation.zh:
我坐在头等舱那儿
那些穷鬼依次走过

translation.en: And a couple of them eyeballing me, mad because I'm snacking on warm nuts.
translation.zh:
他们生气地盯着我
因为我在舒适的座位上打盹

translation.en: So I'm like, "Take your broke, no-nuts ass to the back of the plane."
translation.zh:
所以，我说，"抬起你们穷酸的屁股
回到飞机的后面去"

translation.en: Plus, there was tons of turbulence,
translation.zh: 加上有很多次气流

translation.en: but I guess that's the thing about flying first class.
translation.zh: 我想这就是头等舱吧

translation.en: No matter how much you pay, if the plane crashes, you still end up dead.
translation.zh:
不管花了多少钱
一旦飞机失事，大家都玩完

translation.en: -End up dead! -I'll make sure she's okay.
translation.zh:
-最后死了！
-我保证她会好的

translation.en: -Please. -End up dead!
translation.zh:
-拜托
-死了！

translation.en: You always know just what to say.
translation.zh: 你总是知道该说什么

translation.en: My bad.
translation.zh: 我的错

translation.en: Hey. I love it when you come to family functions, man.
translation.zh: 嘿，我很高兴你来参加家庭活动

translation.en: Because Dad takes his pure hate out on you.
translation.zh: 因为爸爸把他的憎恨都放在你身上

translation.en: -Jeff. -I'm joking. Oscar.
translation.zh:
-杰夫
-我在开玩笑，奥斯卡

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Was there a dog in here just now?
translation.zh: 刚刚车里有条狗吗？

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh:
-什么？
-什么？

translation.en: Like a Dalmatian or a Schnauzer?
translation.zh: 斑点狗还是雪纳瑞？

translation.en: -Honey, what are you talking about? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-亲爱的，你在说什么？
-我不知道

translation.en: It's just a shame that somebody has to die to get the family together.
translation.zh:
有人死了才能把家里人聚在一起
真的很惭愧

translation.en: It was hard to see Dad like this. He's in a better place now, right?
translation.zh:
看到爸爸这样很难
他到了一个更好的地方，是吗？

translation.en: -He was sick a long time. -Since when does dead beat sick?
translation.zh:
-他病了很久
-他什么时候病的？

translation.en: You know what I mean. This is why I try not to get close to people.
translation.zh:
你知道我的意思
这就是为什么我跟人们保持距离

translation.en: -Too much emotion involved. -Guess that's why you never call.
translation.zh:
-要投入太多的感伤
-我猜这是你为什么从不打电话的原因

translation.en: Some families see each other all the time, some meet up at funerals.
translation.zh:
有些家人一直见面
有些只有在葬礼上才见到

translation.en: That's just us.
translation.zh: 那是我们

translation.en: Hey, listen, I know this is a bad time, but I'm gonna need that money.
translation.zh:
嘿，听着，我知道现在时机不好
但是我需要那笔钱

translation.en: -Shit. -We're splitting these costs, right?
translation.zh:
-该死！
-我们分摊这些花销，是吗？

translation.en: Okay. But I don't have it right now.
translation.zh: 好的，但我现在没有

translation.en: What the fuck you mean, you don't have it right now?
translation.zh:
你他妈的什么意思
你现在没有？

translation.en: You just bought a first class ticket for your toothbrush.
translation.zh: 你刚为你的牙刷买了头等舱的票

translation.en: I don't have any cash. Honest.
translation.zh: 我没有现金，坦白说

translation.en: I lost a lot of shit when the market collapsed.
translation.zh: 经济衰退时我赔了很多

translation.en: So, if you don't mind, we gonna have to discuss this later.
translation.zh:
如果你不介意
我们以后再讨论

translation.en: -No, no, no, no, let's discuss this right now. -Hey, you mind?
translation.zh:
-不，我们现在就讨论
-嘿，你介意吗？

translation.en: I'm grieving.
translation.zh: 我很伤心

translation.en: Look at all these cars.
translation.zh: 看看这些车

translation.en: You got to get to these funerals early.
translation.zh: 你应该早点来的

translation.en: Come on. There's nowhere to park.
translation.zh: 拜托，没地方停车了

translation.en: -What? There's a spot right there. Grab it. -That looks like it's too close to the corner.
translation.zh:
-什么？那里有个地方，拿下它
-那里离拐角太近了

translation.en: -Nah. You can wedge it in there. Grab it. -I don't need a ticket today.
translation.zh:
-你能停进去，拿下它
-我今天不想领罚单

translation.en: You're not gonna get a ticket. Would you just...
translation.zh:
你不会被开罚单的
你会...

translation.en: You're gonna lose it. Grab it.
translation.zh: 你会丢掉它的，拿下

translation.en: Norman! Come on. Now, see?
translation.zh: 诺曼！拜托，看到了？

translation.en: Elaine! I was gonna park there.
translation.zh: 艾琳！我准备停在那儿的

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, Norman. Are you family?
translation.zh: 对不起，诺曼，你是家人吗？

translation.en: -No, but I'm like family. -Oh, honey, there's no such thing.
translation.zh:
-不，看我像家里人
-亲爱的，没有这样的人

translation.en: -Elaine. -Oh, God.
translation.zh:
-艾琳
-哦，上帝

translation.en: -Hey. -What are you doing here?
translation.zh:
-嘿
-你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: Well, your father invited me.
translation.zh: 你父亲邀请了我

translation.en: Thought you might need a real shoulder to cry on.
translation.zh:
想想你可能需要
一个真正的肩膀哭泣

translation.en: -Oh, please. Come on. Oscar. -Who the fuck's that?
translation.zh:
-哦，拜托，奥斯卡
-他妈的那是谁？

translation.en: He... Come on, honey. We're here.
translation.zh: 他...拜托，亲爱的，我们到了

translation.en: -You all right? -Come on.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-拜托

translation.en: We there?
translation.zh: 我们到了？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Damn. I got Uncle Russell.
translation.zh:
-是的
-妈的，我还有罗塞尔叔叔

translation.en: How could I forget about Uncle Russell?
translation.zh: 我怎么能把罗塞尔叔叔给忘了？

translation.en: I said what's happening? What the hell is going on?
translation.zh:
我说发生了什么？
发生了什么？

translation.en: What the fuck's this guy doing?
translation.zh: 他妈的这个家伙在干什么？

translation.en: It's very green here, isn't it? It's, like, so green.
translation.zh:
这儿很绿，不是吗？
非常绿

translation.en: Like, God, wow, it's like... It's like I'm inside a lime.
translation.zh:
上帝，哇，像...
好像我在绿色里

translation.en: -Oscar? -Yes?
translation.zh:
-奥斯卡？
-什么？

translation.en: -Look at me. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-看着我
-好

translation.en: Hi. Are you all right?
translation.zh: 嗨，你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, why?
translation.zh: 是的，为什么？

translation.en: All this stuff about dogs and things being green.
translation.zh: 这些狗啊，绿色的东西

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 到底怎么了？

translation.en: What are you talking about? I'm fine. I've never been greener.
translation.zh:
你在说什么？
我很好，我从来没这么绿过

translation.en: Jeff, look at this.
translation.zh: 杰夫，看这个

translation.en: -Hello. -What's wrong with Oscar?
translation.zh:
-你好
-奥斯卡怎么了？

translation.en: -I don't know. -You guys keep playing.
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-你们接着玩

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's the Valium.
translation.zh: 哦，上帝，是安定

translation.en: -Valium? -I'm in the band.
translation.zh:
-安定？
-我的摇滚乐队

translation.en: I gave him one of your Valium.
translation.zh: 我给了他一片你的安定

translation.en: He's probably not used to it.
translation.zh: 他可能不太适应

translation.en: -Yeah, right. -I know you were looking.
translation.zh:
-是的，没错
-我知道你在看

translation.en: Where's he going?
translation.zh: 他要去哪儿？

translation.en: -Oscar! -Shit.
translation.zh:
-奥斯卡！
-妈的

translation.en: -You're going the wrong way, dumbass! -That hurts!
translation.zh:
-你走错路了，笨蛋！
-很疼！

translation.en: -Stop the car, Norman. -What?
translation.zh:
-停车，诺曼
-什么？

translation.en: Stop the car! I'm getting out. I got to talk to her.
translation.zh:
停车，我要下去
我得跟她谈谈

translation.en: I got to speak to Elaine. Stop the car.
translation.zh: 我得跟艾琳谈谈，停车

translation.en: What about Uncle Russell?
translation.zh: 罗塞尔叔叔怎么办？

translation.en: -I need you to help... -Where are we?
translation.zh:
-我需要你的帮助...
-我们在哪儿？

translation.en: -We're gonna be late, fatty! -Damn it!
translation.zh:
-我们要迟了，胖子
-该死！

translation.en: Uncle Russell, you hit me in my splotch.
translation.zh: 罗塞尔叔叔，你打到我的斑上了

translation.en: You got to stop this, Uncle Russell, or you gonna be in a box next.
translation.zh:
你得停下来，罗塞尔叔叔
否则你就是下一个进盒子里的

translation.en: -Hey, how you doing? All right. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-嘿，你还好吗？好的
-谢谢

translation.en: Who are these people? I don't recognize half of them.
translation.zh:
这些人是谁？
我有一半不认识

translation.en: It's your family. You don't recognize them from the last funeral?
translation.zh: 是你的家人，你不记得上次的葬礼了？

translation.en: What side of the family is he on?
translation.zh: 他是哪边的家人？

translation.en: Probably a friend of Dad's from work.
translation.zh: 可能是爸爸同事的朋友

translation.en: You know, the funeral looks good. You did a good job.
translation.zh:
葬礼安排得不错
你干得很好

translation.en: No, we did a good job.
translation.zh: 不，我们做得很好

translation.en: Are you telling me I got to pay for the whole funeral?
translation.zh:
你是告诉我
我要为整个葬礼付钱吗？

translation.en: I'm saying you gonna have to pay for the whole thing now.
translation.zh: 我是说你得为这所有的一切付钱了

translation.en: All right, just for a few months, till I get my next advance.
translation.zh:
好的，就几个月
等我拿到下一笔贷款

translation.en: What am I, a damn credit union?
translation.zh: 我是谁，该死的信用机构吗？

translation.en: Goddamn, man! What the fuck? Jesus Christ!
translation.zh:
该死的，伙计！操！
上帝！

translation.en: Hello, boys. How you holding up?
translation.zh:
你好，孩子们
你还好吗？

translation.en: We're doing pretty good.
translation.zh: 我们不错

translation.en: We just got to wait for a few more people to come and then we can start.
translation.zh:
我们等人来齐了
我们就开始

translation.en: Have you met my brother, Ryan?
translation.zh: 你见过我弟弟瑞安了吗？

translation.en: The writer? Oh, man!
translation.zh: 那个作家？哦，天！

translation.en: You know, I got to tell you,
translation.zh: 我得告诉你

translation.en: I squeezed this job in today because I really wanted to meet you.
translation.zh:
我把工作排到今天
因为我真的非常想见你

translation.en: Listen, I just finished reading Momma's Secret.
translation.zh:
听着，我刚刚读完
《妈妈的秘密》

translation.en: But, listen, that'll be our little secret,
translation.zh: 但是，听着，那是我们之间的小秘密

translation.en: because I'm not supposed to be reading that kind of stuff, you know?
translation.zh:
因为我不应该读这样的东西
你知道吗？

translation.en: Right. Well, I'm sure the Lord'll forgive you.
translation.zh: 是的，我肯定上帝会原谅你的

translation.en: -I can't wait to hear your eulogy. -Actually, I'm doing the eulogy.
translation.zh:
-我迫不及待想听到你的悼词
-事实上，我来做悼词

translation.en: -Oh, I thought... -Well, Aaron's the oldest, technically.
translation.zh:
-哦，我以为...
-艾伦是老大，技术上说

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: -How's my little Cynthia? -Oh, Duncan.
translation.zh:
-我的小塞蒂娅怎样了？
-哦，杜肯

translation.en: Oh, look at you.
translation.zh: 哦，看看你

translation.en: I'm just trying to hold it all together.
translation.zh: 我正努力让自己镇静

translation.en: He was a good husband and a great father to two healthy, strong boys.
translation.zh:
他是一个很好的丈夫
两个健康、坚强男孩的伟大父亲

translation.en: Why they have decided not to have children of their own
translation.zh: 为什么他们不想要孩子

translation.en: -is beyond me. -Cynthia.
translation.zh:
-这不是我管的范围
-塞蒂娅

translation.en: Can I get you some coffee?
translation.zh: 我能给你拿些咖啡吗？

translation.en: Coffee may do many things, Michelle, but it does not bring back the dead.
translation.zh:
咖啡是好东西，米歇尔
但它不能让死人起死回生

translation.en: Tea?
translation.zh: 茶？

translation.en: -Hey, Ryan. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-嘿，瑞安
-是的

translation.en: I got to go over the speech. Could you look out for Uncle Russell?
translation.zh:
我得把演讲弄完
你能照看一下罗塞尔叔叔吗？

translation.en: Look at Martina. Man, that girl is all grown up.
translation.zh:
看看玛蒂娜
天，那女孩长大成人了

translation.en: Come on, man. Little Martina? She's, like, in the 12th grade.
translation.zh:
拜托，伙计，小玛蒂娜？
她好像只有12年级

translation.en: Yeah, well, she may be in 12th grade, but that ass is in grad school.
translation.zh:
是的，她可能是12年级
但那屁股绝对是研究生院级别的

translation.en: -Anyway... -I should go see how she's doing.
translation.zh:
-不管怎么说...
-我应该过去看看她怎样了

translation.en: You know, that's just being neighborly.
translation.zh: 你知道，这是邻居应该做的

translation.en: Yeah, you just do that.
translation.zh: 是的，你这么做

translation.en: -See if she needs a juice box or something. -Man!
translation.zh:
-看看她是否需要果汁盒或什么
-天！

translation.en: "My father was an exceptional man.
translation.zh: "我的父亲是位杰出的人

translation.en: -"He was born in 19..." -1938.
Hi, there, Aaron.
translation.zh: 嗨，亲爱的，艾伦

translation.en: Hi. How's it going?
translation.zh: 嗨，最近好吗？

translation.en: I'm so sorry to hear about your dad. He talked about you a lot.
translation.zh:
我很抱歉你父亲的事情
他说了很多关于你的事

translation.en: Did he ever mention me? I'm sorry. Frank.
translation.zh: 他提过我吗？我很抱歉，弗兰克

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Honey. Can I see you for a moment?
translation.zh: 亲爱的，我能单独见你吗？

translation.en: One second. I got to go, Frank.
translation.zh: 等等，我得走了，弗兰克

translation.en: Thanks for coming, though.
translation.zh: 谢谢你能来

translation.en: Be careful with my shit! Don't bang up the rims.
translation.zh:
小心我的东西！
别把边上弄坏了

translation.en: Hurry up now! We're late!
translation.zh: 快点！我们迟了！

translation.en: Listen, we still need to finish that thing, remember?
translation.zh:
听着，我仍然需要把那件事做完
记得吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on, baby, I'm just not in the mood right now.
translation.zh:
拜托，宝贝
我现在没有情绪

translation.en: I'm not wearing any panties.
translation.zh: 我没穿内裤

translation.en: Hey, my father's dead. Put some panties on. I'm trying to help here.
translation.zh:
-嘿，我父亲去世了，把裤子穿上
-我只是想帮忙

translation.en: Please, honey, I really wanna make this baby thing happen, so, come on.
translation.zh:
求求你，亲爱的
我真的想要孩子，拜托

translation.en: -We've got five minutes. -Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh:
-我们有5分钟
-嘿，嘿

translation.en: -What? -Don't... Don't... Don't stare.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-别...别...别看

translation.en: There's a guy down there... Don't look, don't look.
translation.zh:
有个男的在那儿
别看

translation.en: ...in a black leather jacket who keeps checking me out.
translation.zh:
...穿着黑皮夹克的
